Text: This is x86 32bit version of Windows 7 ultimate sp1

"Do NOT download KB971033 - This is the anti-piracy crawler that searches your system.  If you accidently download this, refer to the web on how to fix it.  I have never downloaded it."

If you use Daz's Windows Loader, you do not have to worry about installing this KB or not because Windows Loader is unaffected
OK so this was upped on 8-30-12 not 9-30-12, It's August :P My bad.  Anyhow I tested this pretty extensively over the last few days and I'm using it as my OS myself, so all should be well.

Newer version is at 
http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/7595193/Windows_7_Ultimate_sp1_x86_IE9_.Net_4.5_Sep3_2012

Uses dism instead of winnt6x integration and has kb2533552 installed via wusa.exe at setupcomplete stage.  It is not a drastic end result difference, but if you are a stickler for using microsoft integration methods, the new one might be your cup of tea.
There are a few updates available that just got hotfixed on sep11, but I will not make a new version of this until the Tuesday patch day in October.
